TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebGetAttribute extends System.Attribute implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior
Public NotInheritable Class WebGetAttribute Inherits Attribute Implements IOperationBehavior
public ref class WebGetAttribute sealed : Attribute, System::ServiceModel::Description::IOperationBehavior
type WebGetAttribute = class inherit Attribute interface IOperationBehavior

summary.span: 代表屬性，這個屬性表示服務作業在邏輯上為擷取作業，可由 WCF REST 程式設計模型呼叫。

span.span: Represents an attribute indicating that a service operation is logically a retrieval operation and that it can be called by the WCF REST programming model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了 之外，還對服務作業套用 屬性，並且將作業與 以及 HTTP 通訊協定 Get 動詞命令產生關聯。The attribute is applied to a service operation in addition to the and associates the operation with a as well as the HTTP protocol Get verb. 與 HTTP Get 動詞命令的關聯表示作業用來擷取來自服務的資訊。The association with HTTP Get verb means that the operation is used to retrieve information from the service. 屬性是*被動*作業行為 (方法會執行任何動作)，將中繼資料加入至作業描述。The attribute is a *passive* operation behavior (the methods do nothing) that adds metadata to the operation description. 套用 屬性至服務作業並不會起作用，除非在作業描述 (例如 ) 中尋找此中繼資料的行為，已新增至服務的行為集合中。Applying the attribute to a service operation has no effect unless a behavior that is looking for this metadata in the operation description (such as ) is added to the service's behavior collection. 套用 屬性的服務作業，應當為邏輯擷取作業。Service operations with the attribute applied should be logical retrieval operations. HTTP GET 方法與所有標示為 屬性的作業關聯。The HTTP GET method is associated with all operations marked with the attribute. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用 屬性。The following example shows how to use the attribute. [!code-csharp[WebAttribute#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/webattribute/cs/program.cs#0)] [!code-vb[WebAttribute#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/webattribute/vb/program.vb#0)]

summary.span: 取得並設定於服務作業來回傳送的訊息本文樣式。

span.span: Gets and sets the body style of the messages that are sent to and from the service operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定為 時，服務作業的結果直接寫到回應訊息的本文中。When set to , the result of the service operation is written directly to the body of the response message. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何設定 屬性。The following example shows how to set the property. [!code-csharp[WebAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/webattribute/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/webattribute/vb/program.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性設計來由 WCF 基礎結構，而且絕對不會從使用者程式碼設定。This property is designed to be used by the WCF infrastructure and should never be set from user code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性決定對服務作業提出的要求格式。This property determines the format of requests made to a service operation. 兩個可能值為 `Xml` 與 `Json`。The two possible values are `Xml` and `Json`. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何設定 屬性。The following example shows how to set the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性決定服務作業發出的回應格式。This property determines the format of responses sent from a service operation. 兩個可能值為 `Xml` 與 `Json`。The two possible values are `Xml` and `Json`. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何設定 屬性。The following example shows how to set the property. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ UriTemplate { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.UriTemplate : string with get, set

summary.span: 針對服務作業，取得與設定統一資源識別元 (URI) 範本。

span.span: Gets and sets the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) template for the service operation.

value.span: 服務作業的 URI 範本。

span.span: The URI template for the service operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks URI 範本用來決定哪些要求分派給哪些服務作業。URI templates are used to determine which requests get dispatched to which service operations. URI 範本允許您將 URI 或 URI 集合對應至服務作業。URI templates allow you to map a URI or a set of URIs to a service operation. 如需 URI 範本的詳細資訊，請參閱[UriTemplate 與 UriTemplateTable](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/uritemplate-and-uritemplatetable.md)。For more information about URI templates, see [UriTemplate and UriTemplateTable](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/uritemplate-and-uritemplatetable.md). ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何設定 屬性。The following example shows how to set the property. [!code-csharp[WebAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/webattribute/cs/program.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/webattribute/vb/program.vb#4)]
